duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and manage the day-to-day operations of two Sterile Processing Departments.
Assess the entire team, develop a strategic plan, and implement change by training staff on new policies and procedures.
Provide mentoring and training to individuals, and assess and evaluate their performance.
Report to the Market Director of Operations and collaborate with them to ensure smooth operations.
Ensure compliance with healthcare regulations and standards, and streamline processes for efficiency.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Healthcare Management or a related field (Master’s preferred)
